Reviews.Title: misrepresented
Reviews.Author: Kenneth a Dinguss
Reviews.Content: Vender shorted the mini HDMI cable.Attempts to rectify resulted in a great deal of HASSLE and a Mini HDMI that did not work with the camera.result: GAVE UP - will never do business with vendor again!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Chris Gelder
Reviews.Content: It works well and exactly what i wanted. Its perfect for family pictures and gjost hunting.  Bad side is the battery doesnt keep very long.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel sensor
Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
16x Optical Zoom
28mm Wide-Angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer
720p HD video in stereo sound
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 720p HD Video (Red) Ultimate Bundle With DigPro 32GB High Speed Card , Digpro Deluxe Case, Deluxe Cleaning Kit ,Spare Battery, Tripod,Wallet, HDMI Cable
